Great product!
Review by Allison S. on 12 Aug 2020 review stating Great product!
I love the scents! The bottles are great and I’m so happy that they are reusable so I can stop using the plastic containers we usually buy. The product itself is great, but I wish it was a little more sudsy. I have to use 2-3 pumps to feel like I’m getting my hands clean.
On Hand Soap Duo (Forever Bottles)

Like the product but LOVE the customer service
Review by Marilyn A. on 11 Aug 2020 review stating Like the product but LOVE the customer service
Very happy with the hand soap. But what really made me happy was the quick response to my order issue. When I received it, it just didn’t seem right but I couldn’t remember exactly what I ordered because I had tossed around so many options in my head. When I wrote for clarification they immediately responded and Personally fixed it within a couple of days. You don’t see service lIke that in online sales as a rule.
On Hand Soap Duo (Forever Bottles)
